name: 深圳福田口岸，靠近香港和深圳CBD，很高兴遇见你
summary: 房主是切尔西球迷
space: 地址在福田口岸,离地铁站3分钟, 4号线直达深圳CBD。对岸就是香港,从家里过去只要一个半个小时:) 家里住了两个设计师,一个新媒体策划。刚毕业的三个朋友。 下了班我们会一起做饭,你有拿手菜也可以试试。 Ps:谢同学心情好会做大餐,五星推荐!!! 家里有吉他和布鲁斯,我偶尔会玩。隔音还不错,不会影响你休息。 我们的周末是啤酒和英超,看展和音乐会,偶尔短途旅行拍片不在家,你可以享受一个人的时间。 固定周五晚上会在家放电影,偶尔有朋友过来玩桌游。 你能参与任何你感兴趣的活动,如果你愿意。 家里暂时没有小孩子和宠物需要的空间和设施,为你家宝贝的安全考虑,还是不要带过来:) 以及,炸弹同学不抽烟,两个姑娘也不太愿意闻烟味儿,为彼此考虑,家里就不要抽烟了。

我们的使命—我们致力于给繁忙的都市人营造一个家庭氛围和丰富多彩的生活居住环境。

我们的口号—“大白给你温暖的家”
—大白意味着全能管家,无论你旅途多么艰辛,无论你在外面遇到多少曲折和不安,在大白之家,你都可以得到温暖和关爱。

我们的服务—为广大的旅行者,以及商务出差,室外聚会,度蜜月等短租客提供丰富多采的以居住为核心的相关生活体验选择。

我们的使命—我们致力于给繁忙的都市人营造一个家庭氛围和丰富多彩的生活居住环境。

我们的口号—“大白给你温暖的家”
—大白意味着全能管家,无论你旅途多么艰辛,无论你在外面遇到多少曲折和不安,在大白之家,你都可以得到温暖和关爱。

space: 1、房子所处大致地段(位于深圳市中心,属黄贝岭街道,离东门商业圈地铁步行可达,位于深南大道边上,步行约十分钟可达文锦渡口岸,距离罗湖火车站只有三四公里,深圳北站搭乘地铁可轻松抵达。) 2、房间设施:两卫一厨一阳台,房间内有1张 1.5*2m 的双人床,主卧室有独立卫生间/飘窗/阳台等;次卧有两间,一间房有1.5m*2m的双人床,另外一间房有1.2*2m单人床,客厅有公用卫生间。每间房内都有飘窗。 3、房子装修时采用传统中式风格,阳光充足,家电齐全电视机、空调、电热水壶、洗衣机等。厨房里有全套厨具,可在这里做饭。精心挑选了不同风格的床品。 4、房子设施:空调、热水器、无线网络、洗衣机、厨房用品一应俱全,24小时热水。 5、特别提醒:使用厨房需额外增加50/天的清洁费和天然气费用。室内不允许吸烟,若一定要吸烟请移步至阳台。整套房子至多限住6人,超过人数需提前协商可加折叠床,会产生加客费用。

name: GreatStudio NewDecor, Nice Area 3rd
summary: Located steps from Bonham Road and the University of Hong Kong, this is a favorite area for students and your travellers exploring the city.  Lots of nice little off the path restaurants and very vibrant and exciting neighborhood.
space: A great offer for this fabulous location near mid levels.  This Open Studio offers a large comfy double bed, FREE Wifi, hair dryer, large LCD TV with entertainment DVD system.  The building has an elevator direct to the apartment with just a few steps to the lobby area. Located on Third Street in a laid back area and has rapidly become a hip area hosting many of the city's most creative types, it takes 5 minutes/3 USD cab ride or 15 minutes by foot to Central. There is a 7-11 convenience store just across the street.  The area is a melting pot of East meets West, with older chinese traditional buildings being surrounded by high end new luxurious developments with new restaurants, nice coffee shops, banking, shops popping up all the time. Transport is very easy through the nearby tram, buses and minibuses.  Of course, the taxis in Hong Kong are most convenient and very cheap compared to other big cities like New York and London.

neighborhood_overview: The Sheung Wan neighbourhood is ever changing and a fantastic mix of "old' and "new" Hong Kong.  This apartment is located in the heart of Hong Kong's commercial, cultural and shopping districts and within short walking distance to the subway and HK Macau Ferry Pier.  A few minutes walk away from the harbour front and the fantastic Sun Yat Sun Memorial Park and Public swimming pool over look the world famous Victoria Harbor.
notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple and all starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  There is also a Visitors Center there if you would like to pick up some maps, local travel guides, etc. to read on your way to the apartment.  If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section  of the main arrival hall where they see all types of SIM cards, I usually prefer the PCCW brand as it is the larges local operator.
transit: Buses, Trams, Minibuses and taxis are near by on Bonham Rd or down on Des Voeux Road West, any of these conveniently take you through Central and all other parts of Hong Kong like Causewaybay, Wan Chai, the exhibition center and beyond.
access: Guests have access to: - FREE WiFi - Cable TV - Hair Dryer - Iron/Ironing Board - Microwave, Hot Water Boiler, Cooker - Towels, Sheets, Toilet Paper, Shampoo, Soap, etc.
interaction: As much as possible or invisible if you want. I will try to meet with arriving guests and show them the area.  Whenever guests need information or recommendations, I am always available via messaging or phone.

BUILDING RESIDENTS WILL COMPLAIN TO PROPERTY MANAGEMENT IF THE LOBBY AREA INSIDE BUILDING IS BLOCKED. THANKS FOR YOUR KIND UNDERSTANDING FOR AN ENJOYABLE STAY. Check in time is AFTER 12:30 pm. Make sure to contact us by phone at least 30 minutes prior to arrival such that we can meet you at the flat to hand you the keys and acquaint you to the surroundings. As this is a family business, please understand that there is NO CHECK INS available after 11:30 pm unless written approval is obtained prior to arrival. Check out time is STRICT at 11:00 am. NO EXCEPTIONS or you will be charged for an extra full day. Our cleaning crew will arrive at 11:00 am to service the flat for the next guest, thanks for your cooperation. Please help us save the environment by turning off electrical appliances when leaving the apartment or not using them. Water heater needs to be
host_about:
I've enjoyed traveling to different parts of the world my entire life and absolutely love meeting locals at each place I visit to get first hand knowledge of the destination.  I've made many friends across the globe and look forward to visiting them each time I'm back in the region.  I've called Hong Kong my home for the past 30 years, this is absolutely a brilliant little place with so much local flavor and western influences in this Chinese city.  I look forward to meeting lots of overseas friends and pointing out the many local favorites so every visitor has a chance to experience the best of this great city.
Happy travels!
Jason
street: Third Street, Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong , China

summary: 三房中的一房,提供单间以及整套出租,全新小区全新楼盘,视野通风采光都很好。 可做饭,可洗衣,近世界之窗欢乐谷,近地铁口,轻松到所有地铁站。
space: 这是一套三房,可以整租,也可以租其中一间,欢迎各位租客与我一起分享这个家一样的公寓,总面积125平,客厅很大,你可以窝在沙发里上网看电视看书或者是在阳台上欣赏不远处的高尔夫球场或者是深圳湾对面的香港,可以到厨房露两手,享受自己的美好时光,也可以跟几个闺蜜来这里开party... 小区就在高新园地铁站附近,五分钟左右行程,离世界之窗,欢乐谷,益田假日广场,华侨城只有两个站的距离。去任何地铁站都非常方便。 床上用品每客一换,每天会打扰卫生会,不定期提供各种水果新品,希望结实来自五湖四海的朋友,倾听你的故事。 因为这个房是全新的,还有部分设施没来得及准备,欢迎大家来提意见~
